chefInfo: Alejandro has been cooking traditional Mexican cuisine for over 20 years and restaurateur best known for his restaurant Pujol in Mexico City, which has been ranked among the top restaurants in the world. He is also the owner of other restaurants, including Cosme in New York City.

recipeDetails.description: A traditional Mexican dish made of masa (a dough made from hominy corn) filled with various ingredients, such as meats, cheese, or chiles, and then wrapped in a corn husk and steamed.

chefInfo: Lupita is a third-generation chef specializing in authentic Mexican soups and restaurateur known for her modern interpretations of traditional Mexican cuisine. She is the owner of Dulce Patria in Mexico City, which has been named one of the best restaurants in Latin America.

recipeDetails.description: A classic Mexican dish made with large, mild chile peppers (such as poblano or Anaheim) that are stuffed with cheese, meat, or other ingredients, coated in egg batter, and then fried or baked. It is often served with tomato sauce or salsa.
ingredients: 2 lb pork shoulder, cut into chunks

chefInfo: Jolanda Sánchez's passion for Mexican cuisine comes from his childhood spent in Oaxaca and owner of the restaurant Quintonil in Mexico City. His cuisine is focused on using fresh, locally-sourced ingredients and he has been recognized as one of the top chefs in the world.

recipeDetails.description: A rich and complex sauce made with chiles, spices, and often chocolate or other ingredients. It is typically served over chicken, turkey, or pork.

chefInfo: Ricardo Muñoz Zurita's passion for Mexican cuisine comes from his childhood spent in Oaxaca and and restaurateur who owns several restaurants in Mexico City, including Casa Oaxaca and Guzina Oaxaca. He is known for his use of traditional Oaxacan ingredients and techniques in his cooking.

recipeDetails.description: A seafood dish made with raw fish or shellfish that is marinated in citrus juice (such as lime or lemon) and mixed with onions, chiles, and other seasonings.

chefInfo: Susana Trilling - is a Mexican chef and restaurateur who owns Pangea, a restaurant in Monterrey, Mexico. He has been recognized for his modern interpretations of traditional Mexican cuisine and has won numerous culinary awards.

recipeDetails.description: A popular Mexican dish made with tortillas that are filled with meat, cheese, beans, or other ingredients, and then rolled up and covered with a sauce (such as salsa or mole) and cheese.

chefInfo: Patricia Quintana's passion for Mexican cuisine comes from his childhood spent in Oaxaca and owner of the restaurant Máximo Bistrot in Mexico City. He is known for his farm-to-table approach to cooking and his commitment to using locally-sourced ingredients.

recipeDetails.description: A traditional Mexican soup made with hominy (dried corn kernels), meat (typically pork), and various spices and seasonings. It is often served with garnishes such as lime, cilantro, and radishes.
